CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Revenue Opportunity'), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Shipping_Address_NEW__c)), IF( Sales_Tax_Historical__c != 0, Sales_Tax_Historical__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c)), Sales_Tax_Amount__c, Total_Sales_Tax__c+S_H_Tax__c ) ), 99999 ), IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Rebate'), IF( Sales_Tax_Historical__c != 0, Sales_Tax_Historical__c, Total_Sales_Tax__c ), 0 ) )
CustomField.label: Sales Tax
